epd_metadata.owner_address: Level 40, Northpoint Tower, 100 Miller St, North Sydney NSW 2060, Australia
epd_metadata.epd_process_certification_body_address: Suite 2600, 101 Marietta St NW, Atlanta, Georgia 30303, USA
epd_metadata.product_group_classification: UN CPC 375 (Articles of concrete, cement and plaster)

classification.normal_class: Designed for everyday applications such as residential and commercial foundations, driveways and footpaths
classification.special_class: High-strength/high-performance concrete, high durability, marine application, post-tensioned, high-pumpability, super workable, piling concrete, architectural off-form finishes and decorative applications

product_description.hazardous_substances: None of the products contain substances listed in the Candidate List of Substances of Very High Concern for authorisation exceeding 0.1% by weight
product_description.packaging: Delivered in bulk with no packaging

lca_information.scope: Cradle to gate (modules A1-A3) with options (modules A4-A5), modules C1-C4 and module D
lca_information.reference_service_life: Not specified (scope is cradle to delivery)

background_data_preferences: Product specific EPDs for cements, admixtures, pigments and fibres
Australian National Life Cycle Inventory Database (AusLCI v1.42) (2023)

allocation.method: Physical allocation based on weight or m³ of concrete; economic allocation used when physical allocation not possible

excluded: Environmental impact from infrastructure, construction, production equipment, and tools not directly consumed
Personnel-related impacts such as transportation to and from work
cut_off_criteria.included: All materials required for manufacturing delivered via trucks and ships without packaging

data_quality.geographic_representativeness: Good to very good for all data sources
data_quality.temporal_representativeness: All data updated within 10 years as required by PCR 2019:14

transport.average_transport_distance: 11.77 km from manufacturing gate to site

installation.operational_control: Holcim does not have operational control over installation
installation.assumptions: Based on industrial expertise and GCCA tool
installation.activities_included: Pouring concrete from truck and pump, manual finishing; excludes pre-installation activities

deconstruction.method: Physical process of drilling and removing concrete using hydraulic excavator

benefits_and_loads_beyond_system_boundar.description: Recycling and recovery of waste concrete into recycled aggregate replacing virgin coarse aggregate

targets.2030: Embodied carbon of all construction materials to be at least 40% lower
targets.2050: All new construction materials to be net zero

carbonation.description: Natural process of CO2 absorption by concrete over its lifetime (reabsorption)
carbonation.consideration: Not included in this EPD results

allocation_approach.fly_ash: Treated as waste material, only transport impacts included
allocation_approach.ground_granulated_blast_furnace_slag: Economic allocation due to significant economic value
allocation_approach.silica_fume: Treated as waste material, only transport impacts included

recycled_materials_handling.background_data_allocation: AusLCI LCA database allocation approach conforming to EN 15804

additional_info.product_group_classification: UN CPC 375 (Articles of concrete, cement and plaster)

primary_indicators: Global warming potential (GWP-Total, GWP-Fossil, GWP-Biogenic, GWP-Luluc)
Abiotic depletion potential (elements and fossil fuels)
resource_use_parameters: Use of renewable primary energy excluding raw materials
Total use of renewable primary energy

disclaimers: Results are relative statements and do not indicate endpoints, thresholds, safety margins or risks
Some impact categories have high uncertainties or limited experience
Ionising radiation indicator excludes nuclear accidents, occupational exposure, and radioactive waste disposal effects
references: Australian Life Cycle Inventory Database Initiative (2023)
British Standards Institution BS EN 15804:2012+A2:2019 and BS EN 16757:2017
Department of Climate Change, Energy, the Environment and Water National Waste Report 2022
EPD International General Programme Instructions and PCR2019:14 V1.3.4 (2024)
Man Yu et al., Procedia Engineering, 2017

contact_information.address: Level 40/100 Miller St, North Sydney NSW 2060, Australia

additional_info.legal_notice: This publication supersedes all previous literature on this subject. Specifications and details may change. Users must determine suitability.
